function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in wastewater","Impact":"Potential risk of virus spread through wastewater","Mitigation":"Implement advanced wastewater treatment processes","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies","People":"Community at risk","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of detection of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater in Australia","Impact":"Limited surveillance for COVID-19 in the community","Mitigation":"Increase frequency of wastewater testing","Technologies":"Wastewater testing technologies","People":"Public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
